Detailed Description

Knight class

Parameters:
x The x-coordinate of the knight.
y The y-coordinate of the knight.
image The image of the knight.
strenght The strenght of the knight.
index A unique number of the knight.
selected Indicate if the Knight is selected by the WiiMote.
